attributes.title: A misunderstanding
attributes.review: I was under the impression that when I downloaded this app John Mulaney would show up at my front door step. THATS WHAT I WAS PROMISED, and did he? NO. This is disgraceful please don’t use this app🤮🤮🤮

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: I don’t like trump I thought this app would make me like him more he is a racist and rude person I hope trump gets to not be president he doesn’t deserve it

attributes.title: Cheeto
attributes.review: I was really excited about the app but after being prompted to input my email I started receiving about 30+ daily emails prompting me to buy cheese Cheetos puffs.

attributes.title: ᗷᑌᘜᕼᗴYᔕ
attributes.review: ᗷᕼᑌᗴᔕᒍYᗴᔕ 🤷sometimes✨i🙁don't😢wanna😱be😼happy🧚don't✋hold😇it🤪against😈me🙆shreck said no and when I downloaded this app my walls started closing in and everything was orange and it was so scary. Also trumps pp is 🤏.                SAVE BARRON 2020
TERRIBLE app. filled with bugs and racists. my phone started crashing when i downloaded app. extremely disappointed.

attributes.title: I’m from tiktok
attributes.review: How dare the orange Cheeto take away tiktok, I mean we need changes such as showing a variety of different people on the fyp, but I hate the Cheeto and gen z can literally do anything we want😚

attributes.title: Supporting the oranges
attributes.review: At first I downloaded the app being happy to support the local oranges but after some time I realized how trash what the oranges stood for was now 10/10 do NOT RECOMMEND

attributes.title: This app is just gross.
attributes.review: When you open it, there’s a disgusting image. It’s horrid. Children should not have to see that. Plus it literally lies to you about COVID-19 and that’s just dangerous.

attributes.title: It crashes a lot
attributes.review: This app crashes my whole phone whenever I open it

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: Absolutely horrible. It put multiple viruses on my phone and I’m sure the fbi is tracking me down right now.
